Package model

Class Population

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Population
  • public class Population
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a collection of individuals in the simulation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Population

        public Population​(Grid grid,
                  int initialPopulation,
                  int maxPopulation,
                  double comfortSensitivity,
                  double deathMean,
                  java.util.Random random,
                  double initialTime)
        Creates a new population with the given grid and parameters.
        Parameters:
        grid - The grid
        initialPopulation - The initial population size (ν)
        maxPopulation - The maximum population size (νmax)
        comfortSensitivity - The comfort sensitivity parameter (k)
        deathMean - The mean value for the death event (μ)
        random - The random number generator
        initialTime - The initial time of the simulation

        public Individual getBestIndividual()
        Gets the best individual in the current population.
        Returns:

        public Individual getBestIndividualOverall()
        Gets the best individual over the entire simulation.
        Returns:
        The best overall individual

      • addIndividual

        public boolean addIndividual​(Individual individual)
        Adds a new individual to the population.
        Parameters:
        individual - The individual to add
        Returns:
        True if an epidemic occurred, false otherwise
